tool_description: Welcome to the ScrapeSoft's Lyrics API! You can use my API to access Google's lyrics database through a web scraping API, which can get information on the lyrics of a specific artist's song. This API uses the following license: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/
name: Scrapesoft Music Lyrics
title: Scrapesoft Music Lyrics

api_list.name: Get Specific Song Lyrics
api_list.description: This endpoint returns lyrics to a specific song.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: You can generate an access token at https://scrapesoft.github.io/lyricsdocumentation/
